channel.title: How to change a 317 login screen
channel.description:
Ok, so I have constructed my first rsps. And I really need to change the login screen because it has the last server's name on it, I could really use some help on changing that. Also, if someone could explain to me how to make someone a donator after they've donated. Thanks. Oh! For some strange reason, (I am the owner), but for some strange reason, when I "::yell" It comes up as "[Co-Owner](then my name). It doesn't acknowledge me as the owner. Help? :confused:
Thanks to whoever helps me, you're a great person :D

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:4, topic:345952"][quote author=The Provoked link=topic=442331.msg3248615#msg3248615 date=1277580128]
Thanks, but that wasn’t quite what I needed help with. I needed to know how to change the background image behind the login box. That has the old server’s name on it. I have already changed the old server names in my client.java.
[/quote]That is client sided so go into your client and open client.java and search what it says behind the login box and change it.[/quote]

You are retarded, don’t help if you have no idea what you’re doing.

@OP, it’s in the client sprites folder usually, depends on the client, you should see the pre-existing image somewhere there, just change this and you’ll be all good.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a 317 login screen

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Learn how to program with Java first, then come back.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @a_billie a billie
item.description:
@a_billie wrote:

One of you guys know how to change the Picture Of the screen where The name Runescape is on a 668?

There is no picture anywhere…
can somebody tell me?

Skype Geoffry1994
Geoffrykramer

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a 317 login screen

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @wintzer wintzer
item.description:
@wintzer wrote:

Seriously? You dont CTRL-F it… In the client folder there will be several images… go through those find the one that is the background. When you find it right click and edit then change how you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a 317 login screen

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @animeking1120 animeking1120
item.description:
@animeking1120 wrote:

umm depends on what client you have. press ctrl + f on the mage folder and search background. or title. usually u’ll find it in the main files or in the sprites folder. if not you need toms cache suite and you have to open your cache up. click jagex stuff and click title.dat. open that up and replace it with whatever background you made. make sure your background is 765 by 503.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a 317 login screen

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Ok, i found one background image and i’ve edited it bbut how do i set it as the background?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change a 317 login screen
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“The Provoked, post:5, topic:345952”]Ok, I tried that. And when I did “ctrl+f” and searched the old server’s name, it says, “Cannot find (old server name)”[/quote]Are you trying to change the stuff before you login? Like for example on the loading bar it would say SERVER NAME IS LOADING… Please Wait or something like that or do you mean when your about to login it says something like Please enter your SERVER NAME Username and Password. Or do you mean the client backround? If you mean the client backround then that is in your spirites folder(s)

Read full topic
